author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie I send you tonight (an hour after first performance) article on Shawâ€™s play. Go over it with F as I wrote it in a hell of a hurry and correct proofs if they insert. Have got first class pass to Galway and am going in the morning. When is the money coming for me and Eva to go back? I send you first copy of Sinn Fein Daily also papers with reference tome. Jim
